channel.title: Drinking
channel.description:
Who here wastes away weekends drinking besides me? If so, what is your drink of choice.
I like vodka, no chaser straight shots. After a while your just sippin that shit :D

item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

I like apple juice.

Read full topic

item.title: Drinking
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Bebe, post:41, topic:267484”][quote author=jme link=topic=353174.msg2711325#msg2711325 date=1237324911]

Anyone ever had ever clear? BLAHHH. I sure as hell tasted that shit when i was wasted.

No but I’d like to try “death mix” (for the lack of a better name)

1 bottle of ever clear
2 bottles of lemon lime gadorade
2 bottles of red bull/mother/energy drink of choice

Throw it all into a camel bak and drink until you black out.

adding kool aid is optional

Should use green dragon instead of everclear

Whats green dragon? never had it.

It’s basically high proof alcohol such as everclear, except with a lot of marijuana soaking in it for a few weeks or more. Then you strain the weed out, as THC is soluble in alcohol anyways.
[/quote]
I had green dragon in Puerto Rico. Homemade 190 proof rum and marijuana…[/quote]

HOLY FUCK! Send me a bottle in the mail pl0x

Read full topic
